After careful consideration, we are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. (2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
